page.title: 03Gayton's Shopping Problems
page.content:
In Gayton there is only 1 shop. The shop is a Post Office which was opened in 1984. It sells milk, eggs, newspapers, greetings cards and sweets.
On Wednesdays a Mobile Shop goes round Gayton but most people do their shopping in Northampton because it costs less even though they have to pay to get there. The milkman sells bread as well as milk.
People said that if a new shop was opened in Gayton they would want it to be a general store. There used to be a general store, but the villagers did not use it so it closed down. It was open for 4 years.
